p: Equations (24)–(27) constitute a system of nonlinear equations. To ensure the stability of computation, the full implicit method was applied to solve the nonlinear equations. For the solution of each specific time step, the Newton-Raphson method, an iterative method, was used. The solution flow chart is shown in Figure 3. More details can be found in Chen’s works [ 42, 43]. Finally, pressure was obtained along with production, oil, and water phase saturation distribution, as well as the high and low molecular weight polymer concentrations.
